title: Steak and kidney pudding with onion gravy
ingredients: 700g/1½lb stewing steak, cut into large chunks
225g/½lb beef kidneys, cut into large chunks
175ml/6¼fl oz red wine or Madeira wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper
225g/8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper

225g/½lb beef kidneys, cut into large chunks

salt and freshly ground black pepper
225g/8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
